meanings.definition: Gazanias: a type of flowering plant
meanings.sent1: The gazanias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some gazanias in my backyard for a pop of color.
meanings.sent3: The gazanias seemed to be gossiping with the daisies next to them.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of gazanias in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the gazanias filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: Gazanias: plural form of gazania, referring to multiple plants of the same species
meanings.sent1: We admired the gazanias lining the pathway.
meanings.sent2: The gazanias in the park attracted many butterflies.
meanings.sent3: The gazanias held a secret meeting under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The field of gazanias swayed in unison with the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The gazanias stood proudly, united in their vibrant colors.
